HOME.INTRO: Welcome to the Ulala mobile game strategy management site!

SUCCESSMESSAGES.ACCOUNTACTIVATED: Your account has been activated, you will be redirect to home page. Have fun!
SUCCESSMESSAGES.KEYSEND: Mail sent, look in your mailbox! (And don't forget the spam!)
SUCCESSMESSAGES.STRATUPLOAD: Strategy well imported, thank you for sharing!

ERRORMESSAGES.WRONGACTIVATIONKEY: Wrong activation key, please try again. In case of problem, please contact the site administrator via the contact page.
ERRORMESSAGES.SAVAGEERROR: Oops, a wild error seems to have occurred, please contact the site administrator via the contact page.

INFOMESSAGES.RETRIEVEPASSWORD: Lost your password or username? Please click here!
